WRITING.TITLE: If God is supposedly real, why is there no actual real evidence of his existence on Earth, or anywhere for that matter?
WRITING.TEXT: And no, you can #8217;t claim #8220;the universe existing #8221; as proof. You could literally use that as #8220;eVIdeNce #8221; of any supernatural being existing, so it obviously doesn #8217;t count.
Sorting process for what? He already knows everything, he knows who #8217;ll pass.

Did you not read what I wrote in my fucking post. I #8217;m tired of these dumb arguments. You didn #8217;t prove that YOUR god did anything or is even real, just that something created the universe. I #8217;ve never seen your God, so I don #8217;t believe.
Faith is dumb. Faith is literally what all the fake religions use, why would God do that? He #8217;s real, just give evidence. That way he would actually appeal to rational people.
No proof he did.
So did it again but on a bigger scale?!??!! I #8217;m sorry, but until I see some grandiose, Old Testament style miracles im not believing
What evidence?
Yeah if I saw God obviously I #8217;d believe in him. But I #8217;ve never seen any proof he exists, and I can #8217;t have a relationship with someone who I don #8217;t know is real or not.
What do you mean?
Links? Any verifiable evidence? Otherwise I don #8217;t believe
So all smart people go to Hell?
Yeah those 2,000 year old made up sources
Who ever says god required faith? God himself or someone speaking for his? Cause that #8217;s exactly what a false prophet would say #8220;have faith #8221;
